snippet: Zdravko Tolimir, a former senior commander, was sentenced to life in prison for his role in the killings of thousands of prisoners in 1995.
abstract: Zdravko Tolimir, former senior commander of Bosnian Serb Army, is convicted by United Nations tribunal of genocide and sentenced to life in prison for his role in killings of thousands of prisoners near Bosnian town of Srebrenica in July 1995.
lead_paragraph: Zdravko Tolimir, a former senior commander, was sentenced to life in prison for his role in the killings of thousands of prisoners in 1995.

headline.seo: Zdravko Tolimir, Former Bosnian Serb Commander, Is Convicted of Genocide
headline.main: Court Convicts a Bosnian Serb General of Genocide
headline.print_headline: Court Convicts a Bosnian Serb General of Genocide
